Title: Breakpoint
Plot: While the Strike Team puts the finishing touches on the money train take down, Vic goes it alone and works with Dutch and Claudette to find a missing kid. David gets an unwanted visit from the Chief and Julien receives an unpleasant surprise.
GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Brian J. White, Brent Roam, Ron Canada, John Scherer, Efrain Figueroa, Roy Fegan, Don McManus, Frank Grillo, Joel Bissonnette
